items.a: Save a threshold on any coin. We'll notify you when the live price crosses it.

items.q: How do I change the language?
items.a: Open Settings, choose English or Serbian, save, and the UI reloads in that language.

items.q: What does the portfolio mix represent?
items.a: It shows the percentage share of each token within your loaded wallet balance.

items.q: How can I add a coin to favorites?
items.a: Click the star on any market row or coin page to toggle it in your watchlist.

items.q: How do I filter favorites only?
items.a: Use the slider on the Market page to switch to Favorites view.
